titleStmt.title: Vincentio Sauiolo his practise In two bookes. The first intreating of the vse of the rapier and dagger. The second, of honor and honorable quarrels.
titleStmt.author: Saviolo, Vincentio.
Muzio, Girolamo, 1496-1576. Duello. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [Thomas Scarlet for] Iohn VVolfe,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
"Of honor and honorable quarrels" has separate title page with imprint dated 1594; register is continuous. It is largely a translation of: Muzio, Girolamo. Il duello.
Quires [fleuron]-3[fleuron] are intended to cancel I1, but the latter is often present.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
